name: Jahnavi - Carved Rose Quartz Flowers and Prehnite Earrings
description:
This earrings features a cascading flow(Jahnavi-river Ganges) of Prehnite and ivory scapolites from a pair of carved Rose quartz flowers.

These earrings are so delicate,crisp and fresh, shimmer and are opulent and romantic signs of spring!, The combination is heavenly! Scapolites are sparkly but do not overwhelm the prehnite and rose quartz. 

The rose quartz are flawless.You will love this! These earrings are super sparkly and light. Much prettier in person.

Total length 2".The combination of prehnites and scapolites are 4-5mm.Metal used- Fine and Sterling Silver.

Kindly contact me for more pictures or questions.
Thank You for Shopping JahnaviDesigns!

name: Angaraka - Red Topaz Earrings
description:
Angaraka(one who is red in color) features a pair of red HOT RED topaz dangling, these are Stunners..

The red Topaz are chubby and I have kept the design simple, to highlight the stone.....Great for Special Occasions or everyday....

Angaraka is awesome!A perfect gift for holidays,valentine's day or for the hot summer ahead.

Total length 1.5".The pair measure-15mm x 13mm. Metal - gold vermeil over sterling silver. Angaraka stones are the lovely red chubby stones and are flawless.

Please visit my jhumkas shop jhumkas.etsy.com

Please feel free to contact me for more pictures or questions.
Thank You for Shopping JahnaviDesigns!

name: Puspa adhyah Earrings - Amethyst, London Blue Topaz and Mandarin Garnets
description:
Puspa - Sanskrit for Flowers

Puspa āḍhyāḥ - Luxuriant Flowers.

Here I have gathered Large unheated faceted gem grade Amethyst Bells and adorned them with London Blue Topazes, the Coveted Mandarin Garnets(Spessartite)and Mystic Green Amethyst.

A hot Pink Quartz used as a spacer is decked with more London Blue Topazes and Mandarin Garnets to create a Vine of stunning Luxuriant Wild flowers. All poised on Sterling Sliver. 

This is part of the collection Puspa for Spring\/Summer. I will be adding more items to this collection with various gemstones to reflect the seasons of blooming flowers.

The Amethyst is untreated stone from Uruguay and has beautiful diamond faceting on the top and perfect pin wheel faceting on the bottom. The color is a radiant saturated purple!

Total length is 1.75". Please feel free to ask me for more pictures or question. This is something you will wear time and again!

Thank You for Shopping JahnaviDesigns!

name: Utpala - Pink Amethyst and Lavender Opal Earrings
description:
Utpala in Sanskrit simply means blue lotus covering the range from purple,blue,indigo,Lilac and lavender. 

Utpala feature a pair of Polished(they are like mirrors) smooth Lilac Amethyst adorned with an opulent clusters of lavender opals, these earrings are fit for a goddess,are mesmerizing and exotic you'll love this...My only pair...I urge you to use ZOOM on these beauties.


Pink Amethyst measure 18mm. Opals measure 4mm. Metal Used - Sterling and Fine Silver. Total length from the top of the ear wire - a tad over 1.75".

Please feel free to contact me for more pictures or questions.
Thank You for for shopping JahnaviDesigns!

name: Maharaja - Ruby abd Tibetan Turquoise Earrings
description:
A Pair of gorgeous red rubies with natural inclusions(rubies are not without inclusions - if you find rubies without inclusions - they are quartz) are accented with smooth Polished Tibetan Turquoise's. The combination is inspired by the jewelery of the Maharaja's. The combintaion of Ruby and Turquoise were set in hig karat gold. These are awesome.


Perfect for holidays. Wear them year-around. Regal and Royal.

Ruby Measure 17mmx13mm. Tibetan Turquoise measure 6-7mm.
Total length 2". Metal Used - Gold Vermeil and Gold filled.


Kindly contact me for more pictures or questions.

Thank You for Shopping JahnaviDesigns!
